cards.title: Putin rejects Western security in Ukraine, warning troops would be target
cards.summary: Putin rejects Western security in Ukraine, warning troops would be target. French President Emmanuel Macron said 26 of Ukraine's allies had formally committed to deploying troops "by land, sea or air" Putin sought to quash the allies' initiative, with a warning that any troops deployed to Ukraine would be "legitimate targets" There seems little hope of a ceasefire for now, after last month's summit in Alaska between Putin and US President Donald Trump.

cards.title: Senegal’s Layene Sufi brotherhood celebrates Mawlid in Dakar
cards.summary: Worshippers gathered at the seaside mausoleum of Seydina Limamou Laye. Chants echoed from mosques across the capital until sunrise on Friday. The Layene order was established in 1884 and is smaller than Senegal’s Mouride and Tijan brotherhoods.

cards.title: Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza
cards.summary: Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza. Video claims to show Guy Gilboa-Dalal in Gaza City in late August. It also shows captive Alon Ohel for the first time since he was abducted.
